Hello, thank you for reading! Here is a quick summary of what I did to push my README to my Github Repository.
1. Create document, and run + knit html to see it displays correctly.
1. Add keep_md: true line back in.
1. Go to Git tab in top right window
1. Select Commit.
1. Select file 
    - In my case it was About Me Homework.Rmd
1. Commit, and push.
